text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
6S2 6 Piece Tool Set w/Vinyl Clad

Product specifications:
3 Year Warranty
Fujiyama Brand
Made in Japan
30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee on all Fujiyama Bonsai Tools
Professional Bonsai Tools

Product description:
text.Response A: This product is a set of six bonsai tree pruning tools.  They are made in Japan and come with a 3 year warranty.  You can return them for a refund within 30 days if you are not happy with them.
text.Response B: This 6 piece professional bonsai tool set includes a pair of secateurs, a tweezers, a branch cutter, a soil knife, and a stand. All of the tools are made of stainless steel and are vinyl coated for comfort and durability. They are all made in Japan and come with a 3 year warranty.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

513.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
6S2 6 Piece Tool Set w/Vinyl Clad

Product specifications:
3 Year Warranty
Fujiyama Brand
Made in Japan
30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee on all Fujiyama Bonsai Tools
Professional Bonsai Tools

Product description:

Response A

This product is a set of six bonsai tree pruning tools. They are made in Japan and come with a 3 year warranty. You can return them for a refund within 30 days if you are not happy with them.

Response B

This 6 piece professional bonsai tool set includes a pair of secateurs, a tweezers, a branch cutter, a soil knife, and a stand. All of the tools are made of stainless steel and are vinyl coated for comfort and durability. They are all made in Japan and come with a 3 year warranty.
